question: [Focus] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.

qas.question: [Focus] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.
[Review] Turkce: Histograma gore how many samples were used in total belirt.
[Detailed] Francais: Indiquez how many entries fall inside the modal bin a partir de l'histogramme.
